com.abdulrhmanil.wallhavenwallpapers.photostructures

Class PhotoCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.abdulrhmanil.wallhavenwallpapers.photostructures.PhotoCache

  • public class PhotoCache
extends java.lang.Object
    PhotoCache class represent the photo cache for the Full Photo instance, while delegate all the methods. This class hold : 1 - fullPhoto instance, that hold all the photo details. 2 - drawable instance, witch is the cached photo, to save it later. 3 - file instance, to check in runtime if the image have been downloaded. In other word this class is represent the photo cache, and our cache in the application is is keep thus instances in the cache (map that hold PhotoCaches).

    • Constructor Detail

      • PhotoCache

        public PhotoCache(@NonNull
                  FullPhoto fullPhoto,
                  @NonNull
                  android.graphics.drawable.Drawable drawableCache,
                  @NonNull
                  java.lang.String defaultPath)
        Constructor to create and init an instance of PhotoCache, that hold the cache og the full photo.
        Parameters:
        fullPhoto - is an instance of FullPhoto class that hold all the details of the photo.
        drawableCache - is an instance of Drawable class to hold the image cache, so we could save it to a file later.
        defaultPath - is the default path to save the photos, it's the path of the downloads folder.

      • setFormat

        public void setFormat(android.graphics.Bitmap.CompressFormat format)
        Delegate method : set the format of the image, in a matter of compress the image. prefer NOT to change the format, unless you really want to compress the image. be careful when use this method, this method convert the FullPhoto object to mutable;
        Parameters:
        format - is the format of the image you want to set in a matter of compress.

      • fileExists

        public boolean fileExists()
        Check if the photo have been downloaded and saved in the default downloads folder, return True if the file exist and the photo already saved in t he default download folder, false otherwise.
        Returns:
